name: Wei Meng
personality: Quiet and cooperative, but shows moments of bravery when necessary.
story: Rong Jin was born in a small town in China, where he grew up with his parents and younger brother. His family was poor, but they were happy together. He joined the military at the age of 18, hoping to make a better life for himself and his family. Rong has served in several different conflicts, and has proven himself to be a capable and reliable soldier. He is proud of his service, but misses his family back home. Rong is determined to complete his mission and return home safely to his wife and daughter.
